chat_text: Hi, my headphones won't turn on. I've tried charging them, but nothing happens.
My smartwatch's screen is unresponsive. I can't access any features.
The laptop gets extremely hot after 30 minutes of use. Is this normal?
The sound from my Bluetooth speaker is really muffled. I've tried adjusting the volume.
My phone isn't charging. I've tried different cables and chargers, but nothing works.
